about_the_game:
Rappan Athuk - Pregenerated Characters


This product has 12 Pre-generated characters fully statted and kitted out as level 1 characters just beginning their adventuring careers, and again as far more experienced adventurers at 6th level. Use them in any Pathfinder campaign or take them into the depths of Rappan Athuk...

If you dare.

You also get 12 portraits and tokens for use with these PCs

Written by: Bill Webb, Clark Peterson, WDB Kenower, Gabor Lux, Greg Ragland, Matt Finch, Greg Vaughan, John B. Webb, and Skeeter Green

Converted by: Perry Chalmers

Released on July 09, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included Pathfinder ruleset.
detailed_description:
Rappan Athuk - Pregenerated Characters


This product has 12 Pre-generated characters fully statted and kitted out as level 1 characters just beginning their adventuring careers, and again as far more experienced adventurers at 6th level. Use them in any Pathfinder campaign or take them into the depths of Rappan Athuk...

You also get 12 portraits and tokens for use with these PCs

Converted by: Perry Chalmers

Released on July 09, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included Pathfinder ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
